Participate in our Research

We want to talk to mechanical engineers or those in similar roles who design or order parts from CNC machine shops.

Does this sound like you? We want to learn about your experiences using these vendors.

We will provide a $200 Amazon eGift card for completed phone interviews with qualified interviewees.

  • question_answer Frequently Asked Questions

    Q. What kind of people do you want to interview?

    Mechanical engineers, product designers, process engineers, or other similar roles that design parts or order parts from machine shops.

    Q. What is expected of the interviewee?

    To answer general questions in a 45 minute interview.

    Q. What is the topic?

    We want to hear about pain points in the process. We are interested to learn about kind sizes, shapes, materials, tolerances, coatings, and finishes that are important.

    Q. Is the interview in person?

    No. We will conduct the interview remotely.
